amendatorysection.catchline: Permits; term; department; adopt rules and regulations.
amendatorysection.para: (1) Permits issued for the administration of general anesthesia, parenteral sedation, or inhalation analgesia pursuant to the Dentistry Practice Act shall be valid until March 1 of the next odd-numbered year after issuance, except that permits issued or renewed prior to March 1, 2007, shall expire March 1, 2009.

(2) The department, with the recommendation of the board, shall adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to define criteria for the reevaluation of credentials, facilities, equipment, dental hygienists, and dental assistants and procedures of a previously qualified dentist to renew his or her permit for each subsequent renewal.
